completedHtmlOnCondition.html:
For your symptoms please follow these steps:

Step 1: Please isolate yourself from others, read the TODO link self isolation guide
Step 2: call your doctor

There is a low probability that these symptoms relate to CORVID-19, but please follow the following steps to protect yourself and others:

Step 1: Please isolate yourself from others, read the TODO link self isolation guide
Step 2: Call your doctor, do not visit in person

You do not contain any of the symptoms of CORVID-19, however you are at higher risk.

  • Take everyday precautions to keep space between yourself and others.
  • When you go out in public, keep away from others who are sick, limit close contact and wash your hands often.
  • During a COVID-19 outbreak in your community, stay home as much as possible to further reduce your risk of being exposed.
  • Have enough household items, groceries and necessary medications on hand so that you will be prepared to stay at home for a period of time.
  • Keep the number of your local doctor or healthline handy in the event that you develop symptoms
